attributes.action: use his influence with English Heritage to ensure that the Sale Hotel, Sale, Cheshire, currently threatened with demolition, should be added to the preserved buildings list in view of its unique architecture and be preserved for future generations to enjoy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: English Heritage seem to have taken the view that the building The Sale Hotel is not sufficiently architecturally significant for them to list. We want to appeal against this decision because in our community there are not many examples of fine buildings and we want to preserve the few we have.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "use his influence with English Heritage to ensure that the Sale Hotel, Sale, Cheshire, currently threatened with demolition, should be added to the preserved buildings list in view of its unique architecture and be preserved for future generations to enjoy."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20815


Prime Minister's Office
